### Cleaning of Ductwork, Motors, Fans, Grilles and Related Equipment
#### Tender Information

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites bids from qualified contractors for the provision of cleaning services for ductwork, motors, fans, grilles, and related equipment at 5 CDSB Gagetown in New Brunswick.

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4562901361
* **Publication Date:** May 6, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** May 30, 2024, at 14:00 EST
* **Contract Period:** The Standing Offer Agreement is expected to commence on July 1, 2024, and end on March 31, 2026.

#### Scope of Work

The contract includes the furnishing of all labor, materials, tools, and equipment required to conduct cleaning services for ductwork, motors, fans, grilles, and related equipment. All work must be performed in accordance with the Specification Number L-G2-9900/1929, which forms part of the bid document.

#### Bidding Requirements

This is a competitive, open bidding process, and the selection criteria is based on "Lowest Price." Interested contractors should submit their bids to the PSPC by the specified closing date and time.

#### Contractual Requirements

A Standing Offer is an obligation-free agreement that does not guarantee the full or any amount of the contract value. The PSPC reserves the right to call up the contract at its discretion.

#### Contact Information

For further information regarding this tender, please contact:
Edward Johnston, PSPC  
Phone: [No phone number provided]  
Email: [edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:edward.johnston@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Notice URL

The complete tender notice can be accessed at the following URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19607489?extsite=MTk2MDc0ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19607489?extsite=MTk2MDc0ODlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
